website_summaries.verdict: This broad-spectrum face and body protection is the last sunscreen you’ll ever need.
pros: A mineral-based and chemical-free product that both adults and kids can use
Safe for all face and body skin types
Contains 7% zinc oxide and 5% titanium dioxide, and provides broad-spectrum UVA/UVB SPF 50 protection
Water resistant for up to 80 minutes
cons: Product is thick and can be difficult to spread

customer_reviews.title: I like knowing I'm safer with a block
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist told me about using the titanium & sink blocker. What she sold was so expensive, I got on amazon and searched and searched until I found this. At first it left my skin white then (due to my very dry skin) I oil my face first - (you could use a lotion) - then I apply the block (A SMALL dot goes a LONG way ... then once worked in input on my foundation and other makeup. I like knowing I'm safer with a block. PS-every once in a while I'll get a little white flake that doesn't work into my skin, I remove it and disgard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is now my daily sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new go-to sunscreen for daily use. It feels very nice on my skin. Not sticky or oily; just moisturized and protected! Spent a day at the pool, and no sunburn (and I burn very easily). I am even more pleased to know this is reef safe so it will not harm our precious oceans. Yes, it goes on white, but it fades to clear in a few minutes. I found it best for me to put some in my hands and "warm it up" a bit before putting it on my body. It helps the white diminish faster. I definitely recommend this product.
